landing_hero_cta_note: No credit card required. Start free in under 30 seconds.
landing_reviews_title: Used daily by active retail investors
landing_review_1_text: I've used Unusual Whales, Ghostboard, Flowtopia, Big Short and Only Flows. Not only is Stocknear better, it has a more affordable price. Live option flow, dark pool, congress trading, hedge fund tracking and even POTUS tracking. If I could give 10 stars I would.
landing_review_2_text: Before discovering this platform, I had to visit multiple websites to access the same data Stocknear provides in one place. Detailed fundamentals, analyst ratings, Congress trading insights, options and dark pool flow, earnings strategies, AI scores, and more. It truly deserves more attention.
landing_review_3_text: Stocknear has become an essential part of my daily stock analysis routine. The platform has a wealth of tools and insights, all presented in a clean UI that works seamlessly on both web and mobile. It's packed with financial metrics, AI forecasts, and insider trading information.
landing_review_4_text: I've been using Stocknear for several months, and I'm honestly impressed with how much it's helped me level up my stock research. The price is really reasonable for the amount of value you get. The Discord community is fantastic for exchanging ideas and strategies with other users.
landing_review_5_text: Offers premium features like live options data and historical data for an affordable price. There are usually new features being rolled out weekly so the app keeps improving. Creator is open to feature requests and takes pride in their product.
landing_review_6_text: Brings analysis tools to retail investors in a way that elevates decision making to pro levels. Stocknear has accelerated adding new features on top of an already solid foundation. The latest AI support helps understand what the data is saying. There's a lot of value in this one website.

landing_more_tool_financial_desc: Zoom out across decades of revenue, margins, and cash flow. Judge business durability, not just last quarter.

landing_faq_subtitle: Clear answers about trials, billing, and what you get.
landing_faq_q1_title: What are the advantages of Stocknear?
landing_faq_q1_answer: See the market the way professionals do. Stocknear combines real-time options flow, dark pool data, institutional holdings, insider trades, and AI-powered analysis in one platform — using the same data sources hedge funds rely on. Instead of piecing together information from multiple apps, you get clean, actionable signals that help you move faster and trade smarter.
landing_faq_q2_title: Is Stocknear really free to start?
landing_faq_q2_answer: Yes. The free plan gives you 10 AI credits per month, 1 watchlist, 1 portfolio, 3 price alerts, access to the stock screener with 200+ filters, and 205+ educational articles. No credit card required to sign up.
landing_faq_q3_title: How is this different from other platforms?
landing_faq_q3_answer: Most platforms give you one thing — a screener, or options flow, or analyst ratings. Stocknear puts all of it in one place: real-time options flow, dark pool tracking, congress trading data, hedge fund 13F filings, AI analysis, and 200+ screener filters. Competing platforms charge $100-200/month for similar data. Our Pro plan starts at $15/month billed annually.
landing_faq_q4_title: How does the free trial work?
landing_faq_q4_answer: You get a free 7-day trial on any paid plan. You can cancel anytime within the trial with no charge. If you don't cancel within 7 days, your account is billed automatically. One trial per account.
landing_faq_q5_answer: Not at all. The AI agent explains everything in plain English, and we have 205+ educational articles covering every concept from basics to advanced strategies. The platform is built for beginners and professionals alike.
landing_faq_q6_title: Can I cancel anytime? What about refunds?
landing_faq_q6_answer: Yes. There's a Cancel Subscription button in your account settings — one click, no questions asked. You keep access until the end of your billing period. We also offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. Just email support@stocknear.com for a full refund.
landing_faq_q7_title: What are credits and how do they work?
landing_faq_q7_answer: Credits are your monthly usage allowance for premium features like the AI Agent and bulk data downloads. Free gets 10 credits, Plus gets 150, and Pro gets 1,000. Credits reset every month based on your plan.
landing_cta_title: Ready for faster, cleaner investing decisions?
